result.execSummary:
All charges against Willie B Scott in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Willie B Scott is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Willie B Scott

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Willie B Scott not in court, defendant in custody.  Taylor L. Kraus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Entry made without court file.  For reasons stated on the record and on motion of the State, Court ordered case dismissed.
Letter received from In-Custody Defedant, Oshkosh Correctional Institution, who is requesting warrant be resolved.  Copy of letter forwarded to Jan Kriner, DA's Office, for action.
Notice of bond forfeiture mailed to defendant; Original in file. ($250.00 signature bond) ad
Signature bond ordered to be forfeited in the amount of 250.00.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH  WARRANT.

Attorney Patrick Dennis Wait in court.  Sara Nicole Volden Schroeder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defendant failing to appear, Court ordered a bench warrant to be issued.  State's motion for Judgment of Bond Forfeiture 30 days after notification from Clerk of Circuit Court's Office is granted by the Court.
Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Macy's at 2500 N Mayfair Road, Wauwatosa or Co-Actor Patricia Neman

Defendant Willie B Scott in court with attorney Terese M. Dick.  Defendant Willie B Scott in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised due to lower pending case this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 7, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
